job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Software Engineer in ISE specializing in AI Platform, you willteam upwithotherISEengineerson customer engagements involving Microsofts AI offerings such as Azure ML, Azure Cognitive Services, Azure OpenAI, other related MS technologies such as Azure Cognitive Search or open source AI tooling.We understand that most technologies are evolving very quickly, so broad experience in the AI space and the ability to quickly upskill and unblock others is the key to success. By interacting with our customers engineering teams and Microsofts product engineering teams, you will develop real-world technical experience that helps customers grow their business and Microsoft to improve our products and services.

   Industry Solutions Engineering (ISE) is part of Microsoft Industry Solutions, a global organization of over 16,000 strategic sellers, industry experts, elite engineers, and world-class architects, consultants, and delivery experts who work together to bring Microsofts mission of empowerment and cutting-edge technology - to life for the worlds most influential customers.

   The ISE team works directly with customers looking to leverage the latest technologies to address their toughest challenges. We develop solutions side-by-side with our customers through collaborative innovation to solve their challenges. This work involves the development of broadly applicable, high-impact solution patterns and open-source software assets that contribute to the Microsoft platform. In this role, you will be working with engineers from your team and our customers teams to apply your skills, perspectives, and creativity to grow as engineers and help solve our customer challenges.

   Our team prides itself on embracing a growth mindset, inspiring excellence, and encouraging everyone to share their unique viewpoints and be their authentic selves. Join us and help create life-changing innovations that impact billions around the world!

   Watch this video to learn more about who we are and what we do:https://aka.ms/csevideo

   Responsibilities

   Understand User Requirements
     * Identify deep insights from customer engagements and partner with the product group on using customer needs and insights to guide future product roadmap

   Design
     * Participate in architecture design sessions and coding sprints working alongside ISE engineers and customer engineers to help them make good design decisions specifically around building good AI solutions, for example ML Ops. This is not a data scientist role - there is a data science team that will partner with you as the engineer on these engagements.

   Coding
     * Be a hands-on software engineer where needed, so youll need to be able to write quality code. We often bring Data & AI depth expertise to the existing ISE industry engineering crew that has end-to-end ownership of the customer engagement.
     * Collaborate with other members of the team and the broader organization to strategically invest in building reusable assets and playbooks built from our customer experiences.
job_details.full_text:
AI Platform Engineer

As a Software Engineer in ISE specializing in AI Platform, you willteam upwithotherISEengineerson customer engagements involving Microsofts AI offerings such as Azure ML, Azure Cognitive Services, Azure OpenAI, other related MS technologies such as Azure Cognitive Search or open source AI tooling.We understand that most technologies are evolving very quickly, so broad experience in the AI space and the ability to quickly upskill and unblock others is the key to success. By interacting with our customers engineering teams and Microsofts product engineering teams, you will develop real-world technical experience that helps customers grow their business and Microsoft to improve our products and services.

   Industry Solutions Engineering (ISE) is part of Microsoft Industry Solutions, a global organization of over 16,000 strategic sellers, industry experts, elite engineers, and world-class architects, consultants, and delivery experts who work together to bring Microsofts mission of empowerment and cutting-edge technology - to life for the worlds most influential customers.

   The ISE team works directly with customers looking to leverage the latest technologies to address their toughest challenges. We develop solutions side-by-side with our customers through collaborative innovation to solve their challenges. This work involves the development of broadly applicable, high-impact solution patterns and open-source software assets that contribute to the Microsoft platform. In this role, you will be working with engineers from your team and our customers teams to apply your skills, perspectives, and creativity to grow as engineers and help solve our customer challenges.

   Our team prides itself on embracing a growth mindset, inspiring excellence, and encouraging everyone to share their unique viewpoints and be their authentic selves. Join us and help create life-changing innovations that impact billions around the world!

   Watch this video to learn more about who we are and what we do:https://aka.ms/csevideo

   Responsibilities

   Understand User Requirements
     * Identify deep insights from customer engagements and partner with the product group on using customer needs and insights to guide future product roadmap

   Design
     * Participate in architecture design sessions and coding sprints working alongside ISE engineers and customer engineers to help them make good design decisions specifically around building good AI solutions, for example ML Ops. This is not a data scientist role - there is a data science team that will partner with you as the engineer on these engagements.

   Coding
     * Be a hands-on software engineer where needed, so youll need to be able to write quality code. We often bring Data & AI depth expertise to the existing ISE industry engineering crew that has end-to-end ownership of the customer engagement.
     * Collaborate with other members of the team and the broader organization to strategically invest in building reusable assets and playbooks built from our customer experiences.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and deploying AI solutions, with a specific mention of MLOps and partnering with a data science team. While it involves software engineering, the core focus is on the engineering aspects of AI solutions rather than developing generative AI applications. The mention of 'Azure ML' and 'Azure Cognitive Services' points towards traditional ML workflows, and the role is explicitly stated as 'not a data scientist role', aligning with the ML Engineer profile's focus on productionizing models and MLOps.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Understand User Requirements' and 'Identify deep insights from customer engagements and partner with the product group on using customer needs and insights to guide future product roadmap' directly relates to understanding business context and translating it.
The phrase 'customer engagements involving Microsofts AI offerings' and 'helps customers grow their business' indicates a focus on aligning technical solutions with business goals.
job_tasks.phrase: customer engagements involving Microsofts AI offerings

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'specifically around building good AI solutions, for example ML Ops. This is not a data scientist role - there is a data science team that will partner with you as the engineer on these engagements.' implies working with models developed by data scientists and engineering them for production.
The phrase 'Be a hands-on software engineer where needed, so youll need to be able to write quality code.' directly points to traditional software development tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Be a hands-on software engineer where needed

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'development of broadly applicable, high-impact solution patterns and open-source software assets' indicates building software components.
job_tasks.phrase: development of broadly applicable, high-impact solution patterns and open-source software assets

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'specifically around building good AI solutions, for example ML Ops.' directly mentions MLOps as a key aspect of the role.
The phrase 'AI Platform Engineer' suggests a role focused on the infrastructure and engineering aspects of AI, which aligns with MLOps.
